title: The Lamb
sample_text: The Lamb By William Blake Little Lamb, who made thee Dost thou know who made thee, Gave thee life, and bid thee feed Gave thee clothing of delight, Softest clothing, woolly, bright; Gave thee such a tender voice, Making all the vales rejoice?
